en.title: You must find it intolerable to live with your {{ divorceWho }}
en.mustBeIntolerable: You must find it intolerable to live with your {{ divorceWho }} if you want to use adultery as your reason for divorce. This applies whether you’re still living together or not.
en.notIntolerable: If you don’t find it intolerable, you’ll need to pay a £95 fee to change your application and use another reason for divorce. Your application will also need to be sent to your {{ divorceWho }} again.
en.contact: Contact the Courts and Tribunals Service Centre to change your application, or go back to change your answer.

cy.title: Mae’n rhaid ichi ei chael hi’n annioddefol byw gyda’ch {{ divorceWho }}
cy.mustBeIntolerable: Mae’n rhaid ichi ei chael hi’n annioddefol byw gyda’ch {{ divorceWho }} os ydych eisiau defnyddio godineb fel eich rheswm dros gael ysgariad.  Mae hyn yn wir os ydych dal i fyw gyda’ch gilydd neu beidio.
cy.notIntolerable: Os nad ydych yn ei chael hi’n annioddefol cyd-fyw, bydd angen ichi dalu ffi o £95 i newid eich cais a defnyddio rheswm arall dros fod eisiau cael ysgariad.  Bydd angen ichi anfon eich cais at eich {{ divorceWho }} eto.
